description:
Our place is close to a number of bars and restaurants along Lexington Avenue including: El Paso, The Lexington Social, and Moustache Pitza. You’ll love our place because of the neighborhood, the kitchen, the laundry, and the coziness. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. We hope you enjoy staying at our apartment as much as we do!

This is our home so please treat it with the same respect as we would.

You will have the whole apartment to yourselves including the kitchen, bathroom, living room and bedroom. We will always notify you before stopping by but do not plan on being there during your stay.

Often times we will be in the city at another location during your stay. Always feel free to reach out to us directly at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).

The location is really nice with lots of restaurants within a few blocks along Lexington Avenue. Super-Fi Supermarket is a great place to pick up groceries. Central Park is also only a few blocks away

Transportation is easy with the 6 train station very close by at 103rd and Lexington. Multiple bus routes run up and down each of the avenues as well.
name: Comfy 1 BR in Upper East close to Central Park
review: Ryan and Bailey were great hosts. They made it easy for us to check in and check out of their home. The 103rd station is a couple minutes away which makes it very easy to get downtown quickly. It takes about 20-25 minutes to get to Midtown/East village. Also, central park is abou a 5-10min walk and 5th avenue buses run all the way down towb. We always had contaxt with them and if he had any concerns they were a call away. Loved our stay and hope to stay here again in the future.
